Spectacular South America
12 Days/11 Nights

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ffffff” divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.23.4″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” animation_style=”zoom” animation_delay=”200ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”20%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” admin_label=”Packages” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ custom_padding=”39px||29px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||0px|” custom_padding_phone=””][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Packages Title” _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”30px|0px|53px|0px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”60px||0px|” custom_padding_phone=”” locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” header_font=”Oswald|on||on|” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”60px” header_line_height=”1.3em” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”]

Itinerary

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ed4441″ divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.23.4″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” custom_margin=”30px|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” hover_enabled=”0″ header_2_font=”Oswald||||||||” sticky_enabled=”0″]

DAY 01: ARRIVAL AT BUENOS AIRES

Arrival at Buenos Aires airport meet local guide and transfer to hotel. Check in at the Hotel and remainder of evening will be at leisure.

DAY 02: BUENOS AIRES

Depart for Estancia full day tour after breakfast. Experience the outdoors of Argentina alongside of the native gaucho community with traditional dances and horse shows followed by traditional Asado lunch. We will then head back to the hotel before dinner and tango show at Tango Porteno.

DAY 03: BUENOS AIRES – LIMA, PERU

After the delicious breakfast, head to a half day city tour viewing– Plaza de Mayo, Cathedral, Government House, San Telmo (Antique district), La Boca (Italian district), Caminito St., Madero Port, Palermo Park, Recoleta (Fashion district), Colón Theater, Obelisk, 9 of July Av., the Mausoleum of Eva Perón, with many photo opportunities in the most interesting places. After this tour, group will be transferred to airport for flight to Lima, Peru. Upon arrival in Lima, head to hotel and check in.

DAY 04: CUSCO

After breakfast we will transfer from hotel to International Airport to depart for Cusco. Upon arrival we will travel to Urubamba Valley for a brief visit to the Pisac market and Pisac ruins. Return to Cusco late afternoon, and freshen up before dinner show. Check into hotel and overnight in Cusco.

DAY 05: MACHU PICCHU

Buffet breakfast at hotel, after which we will travel to the Ollanta train station for full day tour to Machu Picchu. Lunch will be buffet style at the restaurant of the hotel Sanctuary Lodge, followed by a guided tour of Machu Picchu. Machu Picchu is one of the Seven Wonders of the World. Words can’t describe the beauty of this man made marvel. Before heading back to Cusco spend some time walking the streets of Machu Picchu Pueblo. After which we will have dinner in the evening before reaching back to the hotel.

DAY 06: SACSAYHUAMAN – LIMA

Buffet breakfast at hotel followed by visit to nearby ruins including Sacsayhuaman fortress and a brief city tour. Sacsayhuaman was a military fortress made with enormous 300 tons boulders before we proceed for our flight back to Lima. Upon arriving we proceed for city tour covering city center, Barranco, Lima Cathedral, and much more. Overnight at hotel in Lima.

DAY 07: LIMA – RIO DE JANEIRO

After a hot breakfast we will proceed to one of the archeological wonders Pachacamac Ruin. Pachacamac was the holiest shrine during the Inca period. You will get to walk along someone of the same steps that Natives walked over 400 years ago. Later we will proceed back into the city. You will then have a few hours to explore the area of Miraflores and try your luck gambling at one of the many casinos. In the evening we will proceed to the airport to take overnight flight and head to Rio de Janeiro.

DAY 08: RIO DE JANEIRO

Arrival at International airport meet local guide and transfer in. Immediately after arriving check-in to the hotel located in the heart of Copacabana. We will leave for the city tour; starting off with Sugarloaf Mountain, followed by city cathedral, shopping center, local market. We will then proceed back to the hotel and have the evening at leisure.

DAY 09: CORCOVADO TOUR

After breakfast, this morning we proceed to Corcovado (Hunchback), famous for the statue of Christ the Redeemer, one of the New 7 Wonders of the World and Rio’s most famous landmark. A train ride through the forest will lead you to the top of the Corcovado Mountain. Being atop the mountain you will have some of the most breathtaking views of the area. After Corcovado, we will have lunch at an international local restaurant, before proceeding to Guanabara Bay tour. Evening at leisure.

 

DAY 10: BRAZILIAN FALLS

After early breakfast we will check out and transfer to airport for our departure to Iguassu. Upon Arrival to Iguassu we will have a half day tour of the Brazilian Falls. The Brazilian Falls give you a panoramic view of over 200 falls, truly a breath taking experience. We will then proceed to the hotel to check in and enjoy the rest of evening at leisure to explore local town. International Dinner at Hotel and overnight at hotel.

 

DAY 11: ARGENTINEAN FALLS

Today starts with a heart healthy breakfast before departing for the Argentinean Falls. Although Brazil offers the Panoramic view of the falls, Argentina provides most of the water. If that’s not enough take an optional boat/helicopter ride. After experiencing the falls up close we will return back to the hotel to freshen up before our international dinner at Rafain show.

DAY 12: DEPARTURE

Breakfast at the hotel before checking out of hotel and transferring to airport for flight onward.

Have a happy and safe journey!!!
